Settings.QueryText: SELECT DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref, DocumentCustomerOrder.DeletionMark, DocumentCustomerOrder.Number, DocumentCustomerOrder.Date, DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted, DocumentCustomerOrder.Author, DocumentCustomerOrder.BankAccount, DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentCurrency, DocumentCustomerOrder.OperationKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.WorkKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.DiscountMarkupKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.PriceKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.ShipmentDate, DocumentCustomerOrder.Contract, DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed, DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment, DocumentCustomerOrder.PettyCash, DocumentCustomerOrder.Comment, DocumentCustomerOrder.Counterparty, DocumentCustomerOrder.Multiplicity, DocumentCustomerOrder.ExchangeRate, DocumentCustomerOrder.IncludeVATInPrice, DocumentCustomerOrder.Company, DocumentCustomerOrder.Responsible, DocumentCustomerOrder.Project, DocumentCustomerOrder.Event, DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState, CASE WHEN (DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Canceled" END END AS OrderStatus, DocumentCustomerOrder.Start, DocumentCustomerOrder.SalesStructuralUnit, DocumentCustomerOrder.StructuralUnitReserve, DocumentCustomerOrder.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentAmount, DocumentCustomerOrder.CashAssetsType, DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish, DocumentCustomerOrder.Cell, DocumentCustomerOrder.PointInTime, CustomerOrdersBalances.QuantityBalance FROM AccumulationRegister.CustomerOrders.Balance( , (CustomerOrder.OperationKind = VALUE(Enum.OperationKindsCustomerOrder.OrderForSale) OR CustomerOrder.OperationKind = VALUE(Enum.OperationKindsCustomerOrder.OrderForProcessing)) AND ProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesType = VALUE(Enum.ProductsAndServicesTypes.InventoryItem)) AS CustomerOrdersBalances LEFT JOIN Document.CustomerOrder AS DocumentCustomerOrder ON CustomerOrdersBalances.CustomerOrder = DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref WHERE CustomerOrdersBalances.QuantityBalance > 0 AND Not DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed
